third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Devon is very good, but sometimes he loses to a guy and then prepares specifically to win. Knowing Denis's fingers, wrist, and ability to withstand long loads, it will be a good fight.

Devon Larratt.strength: Very good, adapts and prepares specifically after losses
